---
title: "Stochastic API"
subtitle: "Stochastic Simulation Types and Functions"
engine: julia
execute:
  echo: false
---

The `ICOW.Stochastic` module provides SimOptDecisions integration for discrete event simulation with stochastic dike failure.
See [Stochastic Model](../stochastic/model.qmd) for conceptual overview and [Stochastic Details](../stochastic/details.qmd) for usage examples.

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using ICOW
using ICOW.Stochastic

for n in sort(collect(names(ICOW.Stochastic)))
    n == :Stochastic && continue
    n == :simulate && continue  # from SimOptDecisions re-export
    n == :value && continue     # from SimOptDecisions re-export
    obj = getfield(ICOW.Stochastic, n)
    println("## `$n`\n")
    d = Base.Docs.doc(obj)
    println(d)
    println()
end
```
